Message:
I made it to a new town,
but it feels like everybody
here is sorta...
down in the dumps.

Oh yeah...
Not too long ago,
I heard a rumor ’bout a town
where half its people were lost
in a disaster...

Alright then, I’ll give everyone
a reason to smile again!
Just like the great Cordie
did for me!

H...Huh...?
Not only is nobody
comin’ up to me...
nobody’s even turned their
head to look.

In that case,
I’ll reel em’ in with
a pop of color from
one of my rainbow bullets!

N-Not even a glance, huh?
Maybe if I send ’em flowers
carried by balloons...

Th-Then, I’ll use my
special ball to...

But, just as I went to grab it,
my tremblin’ hands dropped
the ball to the ground.

It rolled a ways before
gettin’ crushed underfoot,
its confetti surprise spillin’ out
for all to see.

While gatherin’
all the loose confetti,
I lifted my head to see
if anyone was watchin’.
But, nobody paid me
the slightest attention...

Guess I’m really no good,
after all...
As if I could ever have
the power to make
somebody smile...!

With the crumpled tatters of the
confetti clutched in my fists,
I crouched down on the spot
and cried...
